scripts.set-eb-env: cd ./udagram-api/www && eb init Udagram-api --region us-east-1 --platform "Node.js 16 running on 64bit Amazon Linux 2" && eb create Udagramapi-env && eb use Udagramapi-env && eb setenv AWS_BUCKET=$AWS_BUCKET URL=$URL POSTGRES_USERNAME=$POSTGRES_USERNAME POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST POSTGRES_DB=$POSTGRES_DB AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION PORT=$PORT API_PORT=$API_PORT JWT_SECRET=$JWT_SECRET
scripts.backend:deploy: npm run set-eb-env && eb deploy Udagramapi-env
